name: Galaxy Shooter (NeneWolf)
description:
An old friend galaxy shooting game. Fight against enemies and conquer the universe, by yourself or with a friend.

Single Play: WASD to move and space to shoot.

Co-Op:   Player 1- WASD and space

                    Player 2- Arrows and left mouse button

This game was made based on an online course along with me learning how to create simple co-op mechanics! :D
